title: GOG's giving away a NSFW hospital sim called 'Biing' this weekend
description: You can get the sequel too, though in an untranslated version.

title: Vangers dressed like a racing game, but it was really a decent into madness
description: We're rerunning Richard Cobbett's classic Crapshoot column, in which he rolled the dice and took a chance on obscure games—both good and bad.

title: Rainbow Six Siege is going to start doing evil things to mouse and keyboard players on console
description: Input "spoofers" beware, Ubisoft's going to deliberately give you input lag.

title: iFixit throws its hat in the ring with its own 2TB SSD upgrade for Steam Deck
description: Tiny drives with big storage and even bigger price tags.

title: Diablo 4's first playtests are coming in just a few weeks
description: Pre-order customers will be able to play the beta a week ahead of schedule.

title: Wordle hint and answer #609: Saturday, February 18
description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for Saturday's puzzle.

title: Indigenous group demands Final Fantasy 14 remove Far Northern Attire DLC
description: The Saami Council says the items portrayed in the DLC are "cultural property" that infringes on the rights of the Sámi people.
